﻿simnibs.templates¶

simnibs.templates = <simnibs.utils.file_finder.Templates object>¶

Defines the Templates for file names used in SimNIBS

simnibs.atlases_surfaces¶

Path to the directory with the atlases surfaces (dir)

Type:

str

simnibs.mni_volume¶

Path to the NifTi volume with the MNI template (T1, 1mm) (.nii.gz)

Type:

str

simnibs.freesurfer_templates¶

Path to the folder with FreeSurfer templates (dir)

Type:

str

simnibs.simnibs_logo¶

Path to the SimNIBS logo stored as triangle mesh (gmsh format)

Type:

str

simnibs.charm_atlas_path¶

Path to the charm atlas folders

Type:

str

simnibs.labeling_LUT¶

Path to freeview color LUT for the labeling.nii.gz

Type:

str

simnibs.final_tissues_LUT¶

Path to freeview color LUT for the final_tissues.nii.gz and label_prep/tissue_labeling_upsampled.nii.gz

Type:

str

simnibs.tcd_json_schema¶

Path to the json schema describing the tcd format (json)

Type:

str
